publ: by Francisco Peralta and Courtney Brousseau
name: ACTransit
0:
”Alexa, open ac transit”
”what are the next buses at stop 55559”
”when is the next 51B”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: a. c. transit
des:
You can ask me for bus times from any AC Transit stop, and save your nearby stops for the future. 

FINDING A STOP ID
To find the list of AC Transit stop IDs, visit http://www.actransit.org/rider-info/stops/local1/. Keep in mind that some locations have more than one stop ID. For instance, at College Ave. at Parker St., stop 57774 has the 51B toward Berkeley Amtrak and stop 51582 has the 51B toward Rockridge BART.

NEXT BUSES FROM A SPECIFIC STOP
You can ask something like "what are the next buses at stop 5 5 5 5 9?" to get the next few buses coming to Shattuck Ave. at Center St. (Berkeley BART).

ADD A SAVED STOP
You can say something like "add stop 5 5 0 0 1 to my stops" to add El Cerrito del Norte BART to your saved stops. You can add as many saved stops as you want.

NEXT BUSES FROM SAVED STOPS
You can say something like "when is the next 6 bus coming" to get information about the next 6 buses coming to any of your saved stops.

REMOVE A SAVED STOP
You can say something like "delete 5 1 8 2 8 from my saved stops" to remove 11th St. at Clay St. from your saved stops. 

DISCLAIMER
This skill is not built by or associated with AC Transit. It was developed by Courtney Brousseau and Francisco Peralta and uses the Next Bus API. Please leave us a review or email alexaACtransit@gmail.com with any feedback/suggestions!

UPDATES

1/23/18
- Fixed a bug that prevented Alexa from identifying buses with a letter (like 51B)
- Added the ability to remove saved stops
- Added more instructions above to help new users
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
